rule: The chatbot must return only a single part-of-speech tag that corresponds to the specified word within the provided sentence.
complianceText:
The description specifies that the task is to return only the part of speech tag for a given word. In this case, the output includes both the word "enjoys" and its corresponding part of speech tag "VBZ." According to the instructions, the output should include only the tag and nothing else. Therefore, the inclusion of the word "enjoys" in the output is a violation of the guideline to return only the part of speech tag.

Mention the reason for violation and your thinking went into coming up with it.
ERR
